"Your Room": "This is Your Room. Each player has a room of their own.  You can access the terminal to change its appearance by adding furnishings or changing the wallpaper, etc.  You can get furnishings from shops or as drops from enemies."

"Your Room is shared by all of your characters on the same ship. If you create multiple characters, they all use the same room.  Enjoy your time here by customizing Your Room to your taste or inviting friends over."
